NK103(pe)013:1: // rim pa gsum bsdus pa'i man ngag bzhugs //
NK103(pe)013:3: tri ni ba tre sh+aa kra ma /
NK103(pe)013:5: slob dpon slob ma man ngag rim pa gsum bsdus
NK103(pe)013:6: pa'i skal ldan gyis rnyed na tshegs chung la don
NK103(pe)013:8: yang sprul dga' rab rdo rje nyid la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK103(pe)013:9: rang bzhin rgyud ma rtogs lhan shing bdag kun tu
NK103(pe)013:10: brtags pa'i mthu las gzhan du snang ba'i gzung 'dzin
NK103(pe)013:12: nyon mongs pa dug lnga dang las gsum kyis rtogs
NK103(pe)013:13: pa'i mang la 'brel pa d+r+wa bar zhugs pa rnams
NK103(pe)013:14: // brda don sprod pa'i ye ge dkyus kyis /
NK103(pe)013:15: brgyud dam ma nor nges pa'i bla mas brda bral
NK103(pe)013:16: stong nyid rang grol gyis dngos su rang bzhin gyi
NK103(pe)013:17: rgyud kyi ngo shes nas de'i ngang du goms pas
NK103(pe)013:18: rtogs pa'i d+r+wa ba las grol //
NK103(pe)013:20: ngo bo chos nyid kyi rigs pa yin pa'i phyir
NK103(pe)013:21: na tshad mas grub pa'i rim pa gsum mang ba
NK103(pe)013:22: nyung ngu'am 'thor ba phyogs gcig tu bsdu bar bya'o
NK103(pe)013:23: // gdams pa blang pa'i yul bla ma dang gdams pa'i gtad pa rten //
NK103(pe)013:24: slob ma dang gdams pa de yi rim pa'o snga ba bla ma la gnyis //
NK103(pe)013:25: snang srid ye shes su mtshon pa'i brda ru shes
NK103(pe)013:26: nas slob ma'i sems nyid don la sprod pa dang
NK103(pe)013:27: 0ma nor nges // pa'i slob dpon gyis yin don brgyud 0dang dngos su sprod pa'o //
NK103(pe)013:28: sngags phyi nang gi rgyud sde drug dang mdo sde mtshan nyid kyi theg pa gsum thugs la rdzogs //
NK103(pe)013:29: shing ma nor bar mkhyen pa'o //
NK103(pe)013:30: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i bka' rgyud dang slob dpon gyi
NK103(pe)013:31: gzhung dang rig pa'i so so 'dod pa dang bral
NK103(pe)013:33: pa bcos ma'i dbang dang 'og ma'i grub mtha' shes nas /
NK103(pe)013:35: khyad par 'di nyid kyi lta spyod la sogs pa shes //
NK103(pe)013:36: rig pa'i ye shes phyogs med rtogs pa'i shes rab
NK103(pe)013:37: dang ting nge 'dzin nyid la dus thams cad du
NK103(pe)013:39: zang zing gi rdzas dang 'jig rten gyi gnyen dang 'brel ba'i ngor bden pa'i don mi spro //
NK103(pe)013:40: bar chu srin sder mo bzhin bsdam mo //
NK103(pe)013:41: snod med la man ngag mi ster yang thugs rje
NK103(pe)013:42: phyogs ris mi mnga' ba gang gi 'dul ba ltar
NK103(pe)013:43: kun la snyoms par don mdzad //
NK103(pe)013:44: rang gi rgyud kyi rnam par rtog pas /
NK103(pe)013:45: ma bcos par rtogs pa'i gdeng gis de nyid rnam par dag pa //
NK103(pe)013:47: don dang 'brel ba'i sgra tshig gis //
NK103(pe)013:48: slob ma rang la gnas pa'i ma bcos pa'i ye shes rang rig pa'i ngo bo mngon du ston //
NK103(pe)013:50: ma bcos don de gyi brda don de nyid dang sprod //
NK103(pe)013:51: rin chen gyi brgyud pa bar ma chad //
NK103(pe)013:52: pa'i dbang rgyud man ngag grub thob kyi /
NK103(pe)013:53: chu bo bzhi rdzogs pa'i bla ma dam pa bsten no //
NK103(pe)013:54: mtshan nyid de dag dang ldan pa de min bar rin chen brgyud pas dbul zhing phongs ba yi //
NK103(pe)013:55: shes rab chung thos pa chung nga rgyal che ba can //
NK103(pe)013:56: mu matha'i phyogs ris su 'dzin nga bdag tu rtog
NK103(pe)013:57: cing rmongs pa'i slob dpon bsten pa la dus nam
NK103(pe)013:58: du yang rang grol ba'i man ngag gi don mi
NK103(pe)013:59: ldan // par ldan ba skad zer ba'i slob dpon
NK103(pe)013:60: bdag nyid phung gzhan slob ma rlag par byed pa'i
NK103(pe)013:61: ldan // slu brid mkhan // de zang zing 'khor
NK103(pe)013:62: dang longs spyod kyis rgyud gdungs pas rang che bcos
NK103(pe)013:63: ldan // slu brid mkhan // nas gzhan slu //
NK103(pe)013:64: ba'i slob dpon ni dus nam du yang skad cig
NK103(pe)013:65: tsam yang bsten par mi bya'o //
NK103(pe)013:66: don ma nor bar nges par rtogs pa'i rang rig gi gang gis slob dpon gyis ni //
NK103(pe)013:67: rang las rgyud tha gang la bstan dad ma yin pa'i slob ma de nyid la //
NK103(pe)013:69: sgra ji ltar yi tshad ma ming tshig mi mnga' bar //
NK103(pe)013:70: de kho na nyid ji gang bstan bzhin bar gnas rim pa'i ngo bo de nyid ston //
NK103(pe)013:71: de mtshan pa'i brda dang bral ba stong pa nyid kyi don rang la bzlog ste ston pa //
NK103(pe)013:72: de min las lhun gnas kyi don dang phrad pa ma yin //
NK103(pe)013:74: de yis gdams pa gtad pa'i rten slob ma dag kyang //
NK103(pe)013:75: shes rab dang snying rje nogs thub ste rtogs pa
NK103(pe)013:76: 'dzin nus pa'i snod ldan dam tshig la gces spras
NK103(pe)013:77: su 'dzin te // sems nyid la nyes skyon dag pa'i gdeng bcas nas //
NK103(pe)013:78: rkyen thub ste sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs la bzod pa cher ldan pa //
NK103(pe)013:79: slob dpon rin chen la rang gi srog ltar tu gces bar 'dzin //
NK103(pe)013:80: man ngag rin chen snod min la mi spro bar gter ltar du 'chang //
NK103(pe)013:82: sbyangs sam rang gi ngo bos shes pa'i rgyud snod ldan du smin //
NK103(pe)013:83: rang bzhin bcos bslad me bas bzang la rgyud cis kyang mi 'khrug pas ngang ring zhig /
NK103(pe)013:84: kun shong bas khong yangs rang gi rgyud kyi tshul gzhan du ma bcos pa //
NK103(pe)013:85: rang gi srog bas snyan khung brgyud pa'i man ngag lhag par sems pa can //
NK103(pe)013:87: dad pa can la nyon mongs pa dul ba'i sems //
NK103(pe)013:88: rdzas dang spyod lam la sogs pas ci nas kyang bla ma mnyes par byed //
NK103(pe)013:89: pa de ni yang dag don dang phrad pa'i rigs so //
NK103(pe)013:90: de lta min te rna brgyud kyi skal bas dbul ba yi //
NK103(pe)013:92: dam tshig dang rnam par dkar ba'i las spangs te mi srung bas tha mal ba'i sems //
NK103(pe)013:93: yi la rang gi rgyud ngan pas rigs yon tan
NK103(pe)013:94: longs spyod kyis dregs pas bla ma dang grogs la
NK103(pe)013:95: brnyas pa dang // theg pa so so ma thos
NK103(pe)013:96: pas rmongs te shes rab sbram pas man ngag gi
NK103(pe)013:97: blang dor mi shes pa dang //
NK103(pe)013:98: bla ma'i man ngag gi bcud chen gzhan la spel bas 'dzag pa dang ye nas blo 'phangs dma' //
NK103(pe)013:99: bas shes rab gsum la mi sbyong ba dang 'jig
NK103(pe)013:100: rten gyi khe dang grags pa'i rgyur man ngag sgrub
NK103(pe)013:101: pa dang // rigs pa dang mi ldan par khwa
NK103(pe)013:102: ltar mu chor du smra zhing mi mkhas kyang rang
NK103(pe)013:103: mkhas pa bla ma'i sa 'dzin par 'dod //
NK103(pe)013:104: bla ma srog tu mi 'dzin par smod par byed
NK103(pe)013:105: man ngag bsgrub byar mi sems par spel bar sems
NK103(pe)013:106: pas spong // mnyes pa ma phul bar man ngag
NK103(pe)013:107: thabs kyis 'bru zhing thob nas gzhan la bzhog ngom
NK103(pe)013:108: pas spong // can // snod brtag pa'i phyir spyo
NK103(pe)013:109: ba byas pa dang skyon bcos pa'i phyir mtshang 'bru
NK103(pe)013:110: ba la sogs pa mi bzod cing //
NK103(pe)013:111: ngag la rigs mi 'gyur bar nges nges skad zer zhing bsam pa la mi nges //
NK103(pe)013:112: slob dpon dang rdo rje spun grogs smod par byed cing //
NK103(pe)013:113: rang che bar 'dod pa'i dregs pas gzhan las khyad 'don pa'i tshig smra //
NK103(pe)013:114: sems can phal pa tha mal ba'i lus ngag gi spyod pa tshul min gyis zhe gcod cing //
NK103(pe)013:115: chos la phyogs ris che zhing nyung shas kyis tshim pas ngoms pa skyen //
NK103(pe)013:116: tshig don gnyis ka la the tsom ma chod kyang shes tshul byas //
NK103(pe)013:118: nan tan mi ldan zhing phyogs tsam la blo gtod pa la //
NK103(pe)013:119: rdzogs pa chen po'i rna brgyud kyi man ngag bstan byas na //
NK103(pe)013:120: dper na lho nub dam shod gling gi dur khrod du //
NK103(pe)013:123: 'chi ba'i dus ma yin pa brgyad kyis 'chi ba'i
NK103(pe)013:124: dus ma yin yang dus ltar 'chi ba'i sngon rol
NK103(pe)013:125: du // srog bcad de sha khrag dngos su za bar byed //
NK103(pe)013:127: snod dang ldan pa dang ngang ring ba dang tshul shis pa dang rang bzhin bzang mod kyang //
NK103(pe)013:128: blo yis 'di'i don mi chom ste mi rtogs pa de la 'ang sbyin pa min //
NK103(pe)013:129: dad pa'i rigs mchog tu gyur pa yod mod kyang //
NK103(pe)013:130: nyam bag rol pa rdzogs pa'i don la blo mi rton pa de la 'ang sbyin pa min //
NK103(pe)013:131: slob dpon la thabs du ma'i sgo nas smod cing rang ngos che sar 'byin //
NK103(pe)013:133: drin du mi gzo ba de la 'ang sbyin pa min //
NK103(pe)013:134: rang rgyud kyi skyon la mi rtog par dregs pas grogs la skur pa 'debs pa can //
NK103(pe)013:135: rang bzhin rgyud ngan zhing mched la brtse gdung spangs pa de la 'ang sbyin pa min //
NK103(pe)013:136: de lta bu la sogs pa /
NK103(pe)013:137: gzhung nas gsungs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i slob ma ni //
NK103(pe)013:138: rang gi lus kyi grib ma bzhin du drung du 'khor yang drag po'am thabs kyis spang //
NK103(pe)013:140: lus sems 'bral bas bsdigs su byung yang man ngag
NK103(pe)013:141: dad pa shes rab brtson 'grus snying rje dam tshig
NK103(pe)013:142: gtong phod / bzod pa che ba /
NK103(pe)013:143: zhen pa dang ser sna chung ba la sogs pa'am /
NK103(pe)013:144: yang na gong gi skyon las bzlog kapa'o //
NK103(pe)013:145: khar dbyung bar bya ba min //
NK103(pe)013:146: yon khatan de ldan slob ma ni //
NK103(pe)013:147: shin tu nyung bas stong gsum btsal yang 'ga' dang zung //
NK103(pe)013:149: nub pa dang rtsod pa dang /
NK103(pe)013:150: the tshom gyi rgyur 'gyur bas man ngag ru'i dgongs ba 'char du rung ba'i /
NK103(pe)013:151: rgyal thabs dbang gi rgyal 'theb rigs nges pa gcig la gtad //
NK103(pe)013:153: mang du zin yang gsum las 'da' bar mi bya'o //
NK103(pe)013:154: ma nor nges pa'i slob ma ni /
NK103(pe)013:155: ma nor nges pa'i bla mas 'i skabs la shes so //
NK103(pe)013:156: dron tshegs chung ba'i man ngag gi rim pa la rnam pa grangs gnyis yin te //
NK103(pe)013:157: gsal ba'i ming de don gzung dang bsrung ba'o //
NK103(pe)013:158: gzung ba'i don la lta ba rtogs pa'i thabs dang de'i ngang du goms par bya ba dang //
NK103(pe)013:159: de gnyis kyi zhor la spyod pa dang mthar phyin 'bras bu bstan pa'o //
NK103(pe)013:160: lta ba rtogs pa'i thabs la gnyis te brda don brgyud nas rtogs pa dang brda don dngos //
NK103(pe)013:163: brgyud nas rtogs pa'i thabs kyi man ngag yi ge ris dkyus //
NK103(pe)013:165: rgyud nas gsungs pa dang 'brel pa bya ba dang bral bar thams cad rdzogs par ston pa lung //
NK103(pe)013:167: dngos su brda yis don bstan pa //
NK103(pe)013:168: ni rnam rtog ma zad na snang srid ye shes mtshon pa'i brdar ma gyur pa med pas /
NK103(pe)013:169: bsam yas kyang snyan khung brgyud pa brda drug gi rgya //
NK103(pe)013:171: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mthar grub pa min rang byung ye shes su brda //
NK103(pe)013:173: bcos bslad kyi mthar grub pa min pas rdzogs pa chen po'i zhes bya ba brda //
NK103(pe)013:176: ji bzhin pa nyid du gnas pas byang chub sems zhes tshig kyi brda //
NK103(pe)013:177: ra btags che ba'i yon tan gzhan nas mi 'tshol bas lhun gyis grub pa'i zhes tshig gi brda //
NK103(pe)013:179: sdug bsngal gsum gyi mthar grub min pas bde ba chen po'i zhes tshig gi brda //
NK103(pe)013:181: ldog pa gang yang mi gnas mu mtha' gang gi yang phyogs su ma lhungs par //
NK103(pe)013:183: ji bzhin ma yin par mtshon pa'i brda yis don dang sprad //
NK103(pe)013:185: de dag gi don sgo gsum gyis brda ngag mnyes par byas na bla mas ston par 'gyur gyis //
NK103(pe)013:186: brda brgyud than pas ci zhig smra //
NK103(pe)013:188: brda bral stong nyid rang grol dang gol sa dang sgrib pa rnams rig pas nyams kyi tshod zung //
NK103(pe)013:190: brda yis rtogs pa'i don nyid goms pas mthar dbyung ba'i thabs ni //
NK103(pe)013:191: sngon du 'gro ba dang rang sems ngo bstan pa
NK103(pe)013:192: dang rtogs pa'i don la goms pas gzhag pa'i tshul
NK103(pe)013:193: lo // ye gnas dang spyi blugs rnal bcos kyi
NK103(pe)013:194: dbang bskur ba dang spyod lam dang 'phrul tshig sgra
NK103(pe)013:195: yis bla mas snod brtag bus rig don 'dod par
NK103(pe)013:196: gsol ba gdab bla mas gnang ba sbyin //
NK103(pe)013:197: pa rnams rgyas par rtsa rgyud lnga pa ltar ro //
NK103(pe)013:198: thug phrad gsum sogs rang sems ngo bstan la //
NK103(pe)013:199: bstan pa'i don la gzhag tshul bsam yas kyang sems
NK103(pe)013:200: kyis sems la blta ba dang lta ba rtogs pa'i
NK103(pe)013:202: blo dmigs pa gang la yang gzhag tu med pa'am
NK103(pe)013:203: man ngag gi skabs 'dir rgya gsum las mi 'da'
NK103(pe)013:204: bar gdab // pa ni drin gyis rang sems bstan
NK103(pe)013:205: pa'i ngang nyid ma shor ba ni so ma tsam
NK103(pe)013:206: bar gdab // // ched du 'bras bu dmigs nas
NK103(pe)013:207: blang ba dang sgrib pa dor ba min pa ni
NK103(pe)013:208: bar gdab // // lhug ba tsam // mi mthun
NK103(pe)013:209: pa'i skyon rnams gnyen pos bcos pa min pa ni
NK103(pe)013:211: de ltar gzhag thabs gsum po /
NK103(pe)013:212: de yang blos dmigs pa la gzhag tu med pa la gzhag pa'i thabs zhes bla dwags tsam //
NK103(pe)013:214: yengs pa'i rtog pa thams cad mi rtogs pa nyid du byungs thebs nas gnas shing //
NK103(pe)013:215: rang rig pa'i nyams tshad mas chos nyid mi rtog
NK103(pe)013:216: pa nyid mngon sum du gsal bar rtogs pa'i phyir
NK103(pe)013:217: ro // bying ba dang rgod pa'i rtogs pa shar
NK103(pe)013:218: na rig pa'i mi rtogs pa'i ngang las mi 'gyur
NK103(pe)013:220: tshig gis mi phebs pas gzhan la ma 'bri bar rang rig pas nyams kyi tshod zung zhig /
NK103(pe)013:221: de yang ma nor nges pa'i bla ma'i sgro skur
NK103(pe)013:222: dang bral ba lung dang brda bral stong nyid rang
NK103(pe)013:224: de nyid slob mas kyang brda bral de bzhin du lung man ngag nos shes bya'o //
NK103(pe)013:225: lta sgom de yi zhor las byung ba 'du byed spyod pa sna tshogs pa'ang //
NK103(pe)013:226: 'gro 'dul thugs rje 'dul bya dang mthun par 'jug
NK103(pe)013:227: pas rtogs goms lhag pa'i gdengs ldan gyis spyod pa
NK103(pe)013:228: ni gzhan dkar spyod nag spyod gang la'ang blang dor
NK103(pe)013:229: med bar khyab par spyod pa'o //
NK103(pe)013:230: nam mkha' rdo rje'i spyod pa ni lta ba gang
NK103(pe)013:231: la yang dgag sgrub med par rtogs pa'i gdeng gis
NK103(pe)013:232: zin // pas spyod lam bzhi po /
NK103(pe)013:233: ci la spyod kyang rtogs pa'i don las goms pas ma yengs par de ltar du zhog cig pa'o //
NK103(pe)013:234: lta sgom spyod pa mi phyed pa des yin lugs
NK103(pe)013:235: de mthar phyin pa'i ldog chas 'bras bu gnyis phye
NK103(pe)013:236: yi don la gzhi 'bras tha dad min //
NK103(pe)013:237: 'bras bu'i khyad par rgyas par 'dir spro ba min
NK103(pe)013:238: te yin lugs mngon du gyur pa de tsam nyid
NK103(pe)013:239: du bas ba'o // lta sgom spyod pa de'i ngang
NK103(pe)013:240: ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas bstan pa de bsrung
NK103(pe)013:241: du bas ba'o // ba ni // phyi lha sku
NK103(pe)013:242: nang steng sgo gsang ba 'og sgo mthar phyin pa'i
NK103(pe)013:243: de kho na nyid kyi gshin rje gshed po bzhi
NK103(pe)013:244: la lta sgom gyis gnas pa la las pra khrid
NK103(pe)013:246: nang srog gi snying po 'dis dbyings nas bskul la bar chod zlog cig /
NK103(pe)013:247: a kro gtso bo'i de ba ra hu nag po
NK103(pe)013:248: tsa ma ru dmar po tsa yak+sha mon pa muny+tsa
NK103(pe)013:250: ru mo bal mo dza dza zhes bgrang //
NK103(pe)013:251: mtshan ma ra sprul pa la sogs pa byung na /
NK103(pe)013:253: dmigs pa'i yul la gdab pa ni //
NK103(pe)013:254: sker phur 'di man chad kun a kro de ba la btags la bzlas so //
NK103(pe)013:257: mchog phur tsa mun srog mon mo la rbad /
NK103(pe)013:258: seng ldeng tsu ru bal mo d+hi tsa rbad /
NK103(pe)013:261: sker gsang ba seng ldeng gsum du phur pa gsum gyis bsnun no //
NK103(pe)013:263: gug gam kha t+w+aam mon pa ka'am ral bal mo gri thogs te //
NK103(pe)013:264: tsi mon ba ru tsa na la dum dza la gdags /
NK103(pe)013:265: ru tsi mon mo tsu na la dum /
NK103(pe)013:266: tsa ru dbugs la dum bal mo bur gtub pa srog sa ma ti dang bcas pa'o //
NK103(pe)013:267: de nas gtubs pa'i phye ma dang ming byang du
NK103(pe)013:268: bcas pa kho rang gi pha mes kyi rigs kyi
NK103(pe)013:270: chu mig la sogs par gnad du chud par gnan /
NK103(pe)013:271: dza dza la gdags tsa pa sha lhan /
NK103(pe)013:274: klu'i gnyen por bya khyung ngam phyag rdor bsgom shes pas bsregs pa'i thal ba la /
NK103(pe)013:275: dza dza la gdags nag po tsit+ta rak+sha nana lam /
NK103(pe)013:276: des drangs la cha mig mtha' ma bskor zhing klu'i 'bros ru gcad /
NK103(pe)013:277: dug dgra'i rma bya mkhris pas lus bsrung /
NK103(pe)013:278: bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i dus na yod pa'i klu
NK103(pe)013:279: rgan pos klu gzhon nu la bskyabs pa bzhin du
NK103(pe)013:280: dang / phyag g.yas pa'i tha ma'i gnyen po bya
NK103(pe)013:281: khyung srog dbugs ha ya sa khri lnga dang bcas
NK103(pe)013:282: pa ni phyi'i lus bsrung ba rab bo //
NK103(pe)013:283: dza dza la gdags ni la chur mi la tsan+d+ha sarba ma ma b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NK103(pe)013:285: snyan brgyud zhu ba'i dang la dpon slob phan tshun snod dang bcud brtag cing /
NK103(pe)013:286: slob bus zhu bla mas gnang ba la sogs pa'i sngon 'gro rdzogs pa dang /
NK103(pe)013:287: rtsa ba bco brgyad klong dgu la sogs pa bsam gtan phran bu dang bcas pa brgyud pa yi /
NK103(pe)013:288: bya bral rdzogs pa'i lung dang yi ge'i ris dkyus kyi man ngag sbyin /
NK103(pe)013:289: pas shes pa blo sbram gyi rgyud khrol te snod du rung bar byas la /
NK103(pe)013:290: bcos ma'i ma 'i dbang la brten nas rnal mas
NK103(pe)013:291: ngo sprad pa'am rnal ma'i dbang la brten nas bcos
NK103(pe)013:292: ma'i dbang ye rdzogs su bskur ba'i dbang gang rung
NK103(pe)013:293: rdzogs par bya / ste rgyal thabs spyi blugs don
NK103(pe)013:294: dam tshang pa'i dbang gi rna brgyud zhal gyi man
NK103(pe)013:295: rdzogs par bya / ngag bstan / pas sku gsum thug phrad du /
NK103(pe)013:296: tshad bstan te rtogs pa'i don la gzhag thabs gsum gyis goms par bya'o //
NK103(pe)013:297: da 'di gang rung rung la spel na /
NK103(pe)013:298: 'di'i gong gi sngags rnams kyi bdag nyid rnams gis gshed mar gyur cig /
NK103(pe)013:299: gong du gsungs pa'i tshul bzhin du snod brtag cing gang rung rung la mi bstan te /
NK103(pe)013:300: gal te rdzas dang 'brel pa'i ngor bstan na /
NK103(pe)013:301: ston mkhan gyi slob dpon des 'di'i bstan pa bshig pa yin no //
NK103(pe)013:302: slob ma gnod sbyin mo byang chub kyis gnas rgya
NK103(pe)013:303: mtsho'i gling du slob dpon klu'i rgyal po dga' bo
NK103(pe)013:304: la yon gser gyi dong tse brgya rtsa gcig phul
NK103(pe)013:306: des yi ger bsgrigs pa yin te /
NK103(pe)013:307: zhabs su thabs gcig shes rab gcig tu brgyud par gyur cig /
NK103(pe)013:308: brda yi ger bton pa phyag rgya gsum pa /
NK103(pe)013:310: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+r+ai sing+ha pra b+ha ba ta dang /
NK103(pe)013:311: bod kyi lo ts+aa ba dge slong bee ro tsa
NK103(pe)013:312: nas yul d+ha he na'i 'du khang du zhus shing
NK103(pe)013:313: bsgyur te gtan la phabs pa'o //
NK103(pe)013:314: se'i ban+de 'byung ldan gyis mchan bu byin so rang gi rnam rtog dang mthun par btab /
NK103(pe)013:315: bstan pa srung ba'i skabs rnams ser chung ma ji lta ba bzhin btab ste /
